workshops.title: Establishing the Business Model and Validating Ideas
workshops.focus: Business Model Canvas, Market Validation, Branding
topics: Introduction to defining your business model and value proposition
Hands-on exercises to refine your Lean Canvas
Methods for testing ideas and gaining customer feedback
Creating a compelling brand identity and positioning a startup
workshops.office_hours: One-on-one mentoring sessions before or after workshops
workshops.networking: Slack channels for informal connections with mentors and peers

workshops.title: Prototyping & Business Development
workshops.focus: Turning ideas into prototypes and refining business models
topics: Building MVPs using Figma and Bubble
Refining the Business Model Canvas based on customer feedback
workshops.virtual_component: Collaborative work using Figma and Bubble, check-in sessions for feedback
workshops.office_hours: One-on-one mentoring to refine MVP or discuss business decisions
workshops.networking: Slack and video chat access to mentors

workshops.title: Scaling & Market Strategy
workshops.focus: Growing the business and acquiring customers
topics: Sales funnel design and closing sales
workshops.virtual_component: Webinars on fundraising and scaling strategies, live Q&A with successful entrepreneurs
workshops.office_hours: One-on-one mentoring on growth strategies and fundraising
workshops.networking: Slack and Zoom discussions with mentors

workshops.title: Pitch Preparation & Refinement
workshops.focus: Perfecting the pitch and preparing for the final presentation
topics: Booth setup guidance for the Outdoor Startup Fair
workshops.virtual_component: Pre-recorded and live-streamed pitch sessions, mentor feedback on pitch decks
workshops.office_hours: Final pitch rehearsals and script reviews

events.title: Pitch Day
activities: Live pitching to investors, mentors, and industry leaders
Award ceremony with categories like Best Pitch, Most Scalable Idea, and Audience Favorite

events.title: Outdoor Startup Fair
activities: Startups showcase MVPs in physical and virtual booths
Networking with investors and industry peers

events.title: Nordic Retreat & Closing Ceremony
activities: In-person: Sauna experiences, kayaking under the Midnight Sun
Virtual: Wellness webinars and live-streamed closing ceremony

benefits: Logo on event website and marketing materials
Mention in opening and closing remarks
Dedicated sponsor booth at the Outdoor Startup Fair
Opportunity to introduce a workshop or speaker
Logo on event website and marketing materials
Mention in opening and closing remarks
Shared sponsor booth at the Outdoor Startup Fair
Logo on event website and marketing materials
Mention in opening and closing remarks
